Title: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') in ezsystems/ezpublish-kernel.
AffectedVersions: All versions up to 6.13.8.1, all versions starting from 7.0.0 up to 7.5.15.1
NotImpacted: All versions after 6.13.8.1 before 7.0.0, all versions after 7.5.15.1
